channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ex On The Beach
channel.desc: Becci is tired of being the fat sister while Kieran is sick of feeling like the runt of the litter. Can they transform their bodies in time to bare all in an Ex on the Beach reveal? (S1, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Skin A&E
channel.desc: Top dermatologists help members of the public with a range of skin conditions. (S3, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Rival Artists design head-to-head to please unhappy Canvases, but only one will receive a shot at redemption. Josh Hibbard and Kyle Dunbar, and brothers Robbie and Jayvo return. (S1, ep5).
